      Sets both the timeout until a connection is established and the socket timeout (i.e.
      AuthenticationClientBuilder AuthenticationClientBuilder.setOrgUrl(String baseUrl)
      Sets the base URL of the Okta REST API to use.
      AuthenticationClientBuilder AuthenticationClientBuilder.setProxy(com.okta.commons.http.config.Proxy proxy)
      Sets the HTTP proxy to be used when communicating with the Okta API server.
      AuthenticationClientBuilder AuthenticationClientBuilder.setRetryMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
      Sets the maximum number of attempts to retrying before giving up.
      AuthenticationClientBuilder AuthenticationClientBuilder.setRetryMaxElapsed(int maxElapsed)
      Sets the maximum number of milliseconds to wait when retrying before giving up.
